| History                 = The Agence Byzantine is a French criminal organization, who along [[Hydra (Earth-616)|Hydra]], [[Advanced Idea Mechanics (Earth-616)|A.I.M.]], the [[Secret Empire (Earth-616)|Secret Empire]], the [[Black Spectre (Criminal Organization) (Earth-616)|Black Spectre]], and [[Roxxon Oil]] created an alliance.

When [[Matthew Murdock (Earth-616)|Daredevil]] stole the [[Omegadrive]], an object which contained data about every one of those organizations and more, from them, the Agencé tried many times to retrieve it, as well as the rest of the organizations.{{r|Daredevil Vol 3 11}}
